main.name: Nivedita Madhava
main.bio: Hi! I am Nivedita. M, I am a self learned developer. I love writing code to solve complex issues. I thought myself how to code though tech blogs written by famous developers and few other courses done on various LMS platforms. I am pursuing my Engineering in Electrical and Electronics so with my Engineering skills I can Create complex algorithms for data interpretation. I have proficiency in Python, Java, C (programming), C++. I have done my Machine learning course from Stanford. I am a Photoshop artist you can check my art work in my Instagram @psnive. I have a website where I write tech blogs.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies. These are some of my skills

education.description: Here I am pursuing my Bachelors of Electrical and Electronics Engineering. I have a passion towards Software Engineering and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning.

work.title: Machine Learning Intern
work.description: For most of my time at AMZ Automotive, I have worked as a Machine Learning Intern. Here I have had the chance to teach about what I knew about Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Python Programming. I have also worked with Autonomous car.

work.title: Co-Founder & Tech Blogger
work.description: Having my own blog has given me an understanding of how to host a site, What are the security protocols, and having a tech blog has helped me to keep in touch with the new technologies. I will be taking care of back-end code and server maintenance and posting blogs.

work.title: IoT Developer Intern
work.description: I was assigned to work on a Home Automation using Raspberry pi and Google Assistance. This gave me a hands-on experience to work with Raspberry pi and experiment with it.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: I am most familiar with Python Programming Language. I use it as my base for most of my projects, as it's my base language, well I can handle most of the libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-lern, etc, and I am familiar with API's in python as well.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: I first started my Java Program when I was in 8th grade. I am familiar with this language.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I do have a ocd, so for code managment i use git, and i am very profecient in it, all my projects are on gihub and I can handle any git conflicts

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: As you can see I have secured 95% in Machine Learning from Stanford, I have been developing few machine learning algorithms so far, using libraries like pandas, numpy, tensorflow, opencv etc, I am comfortable with this technology

skills.name: Data Science
skills.description: As I was into machine learning, I need to handle data, so I was interested in data handling and all, so data science was the best choice I have done. I have done a data science specialization course in the University of Michigan I was doing data analysis and I was an intern in talent down as a data analyst as well.

skills.name: Linux
skills.description: i am handy in linux handling and bash scripting.

skills.name: Data Structures
skills.description: As i mentioned i have OCD, Data structures is a essence in my code, i will try to maintain nlog(n) always

skills.name: Photoshop
skills.description: I use Photoshop as my hobby. I have an instagram account with all my photoshoped art @psnive. I have built a few logos also with it.

skills.name: IoT
skills.description: I have a self-experience on IoT, i was an intern in a compnay called verzo as IoT developer, there i have done a home automation using google assistance, and personally i have done home Automation using Raspberrypi, where you can control any home appliances with your phone.

skills.name: Web Development(HTML, CSS, Js)
skills.description: I have developed many websites as a freelancer.

projects.title: OCR
projects.category: A text detection model for reading RCs.Using both free and paid APIs such as AWS textract, AWS Rekognition, Google vision etc.

projects.title: Autonomous Self Driving car
projects.category: Its an driverless car built on distributed learning and opencv.

projects.title: Cognive Blog
projects.category: Its my technical blogging website. I write tech blogs as well handle the sever and security protocols.
